abstract: Environmental Protection Agency issues proposal for amount of biofuel that must be blended into conventional vehicle fuel, increasing volume of renewable fuel required by roughly 9 percent, to 17.4 billion gallons, by end of 2016.
lead_paragraph: The proposal on the amount of biofuel that must be blended into conventional vehicle fuel has been long delayed and seemed to please few.

headline.main: E.P.A. Proposes Changes to Fuel Standards
headline.print_headline: E.P.A. Alters Plans to Mix Biofuel Into Gasoline

snippet: The proposal on the amount of biofuel that must be blended into conventional vehicle fuel has been long delayed and seemed to please few.
